file_content.text:
Victory over the Eternal Empire will never be possible until every Star Fortress has been destroyed. Only the Alliance has the means to eliminate these dire threats to galactic peace.
Your mission is to successfully attack Star Fortresses six times within a week. Any victory achieved in Heroic Mode counts for double.
Enter Mayhem at the Arena Grand as a solo contender and battle for your chance to claim the Eternal Championship.
Enter Mayhem at the Arena Grand with the option of bringing along a group and battle for your chance to claim the Eternal Championship.
